main event: A sighting of an object believed to be a satellite occurred on April 18, 1962.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 15 minutes,The object was reported to be at an altitude in excess of 100,000 feet,The object traveled at tremendous speed,The direction of the object's movement was towards the northeast,The sighting was cataloged in the Project Blue Book report.
sighted object: a bright object that looked like a satellite
